items.sentence: Tom wants to ask you about your trip to Boston.
Tom was arrested in Boston yesterday afternoon.
Tom was listening to his iPod as he worked out.
Tom was strong enough to swim across the river.
I\'m glad I wasn\'t the one who had to do that.
You won\'t be needing that where you\'re going.
I feel like I need to do something to help Tom.
I figured a change of scenery might do us good.
I finally was able to find out where Tom lives.
I find it difficult to give speeches in French.
I folded my shirts and put them in my suitcase.
I forgot that Tom was coming to dinner tonight.
Do you think anybody would care if we did that?
Do you usually go to the country in the summer?
Tom didn\'t seem to be happy with our decision.
Tom didn\'t show up for work on Monday morning.
Tom didn\'t tell me that you were so beautiful.
Tom didn\'t tell me who his French teacher was.
I\'m still not happy with how things are going.
I\'m sure Tom is aware Mary is in the hospital.
